references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).

links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..564

Index entries for continued fractions for constants
prog: (PARI) { allocatemem(932245000); default(realprecision, 10000); x=suminf(k=2, 1/2^fibonacci(k)); c=contfrac(x); for (n=1, 565, write("b006518.txt", n-1, " ", c[n])); } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, May 04 2009
crossrefs: Cf. A084119, A124091. - _Harry J. Smith_, May 04 2009
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
